comments: Washington (CHA) maintains a legal guarding position during the post shot attempt by Bagley III (SAC).
Ball (CHA) makes clean ball contact to dislodge the ball from Holmes (SAC) during the rebound.
Ball (CHA) places his extended arm to Fox's (SAC) chest and the contact is marginal as it does not dislodge Fox from his legal guarding position.
Hield (SAC) maintains a legal guarding position during the driving shot attempt by Monk (CHA) and Bagley III (SAC) cleanly blocks the shot.
Rozier (CHA) maintains a legal guarding position on Fox (SAC) and makes clean ball contact to poke it loose during the drive.
Bridges (CHA) legally contests Barnes' (SAC) driving shot attempt and any follow-through arm contact after the release is deemed marginal.
Fox (SAC) intercepts the inbound pass and legally takes one step before releasing his dribble after he gathers and controls the ball.
All Flagrant Fouls are reviewed by League Operations.

Ball (CHA) maintains a legal guarding position during the play at the basket by Bagley III (SAC) and cleanly blocks the shot. Any body follow-through contact with Washington (CHA) after the block is deemed incidental.
Bridges (CHA) makes contact to Bagley III's (SAC) arm that affects his ability to make his intended pass.
Fox (SAC) makes marginal contact with Ball (CHA) when he reaches in.
During the inbound, Washington (CHA) establishes himself in a screening position in Barnes' (SAC) path and absorbs the contact.

Barnes (SAC) jumps towards Rozier (CHA) to contest his jump shot attempt and makes contact with his lower body that affects his jump shot attempt.  Barnes would make contact with Rozier regardless of any leg extension.
Hield (SAC) and Martin (CHA) briefly engage and disengage during the inbound.
Hield (SAC) briefly grasps Martin's (CHA) jersey and the contact is marginal as it does not affect Martin's ability to maintain his legal guarding position.
Bridges (CHA) commits a take foul on Hield (SAC).
Joseph (SAC) maintains a legal guarding position on Monk (CHA) during the drive.
Holmes (SAC) makes contact with Monk's (CHA) body that affects his driving shot attempt.
